breakdowns.description: Creates a new task using the POST /tasks/ endpoint.
conditions: A new task should not have any users assigned.
Task should always have a name.

breakdowns.description: Retrieves a list of tasks using the GET /tasks/ endpoint.
Retrieves a specific task by its ID using the GET /tasks/{task_id} endpoint.
Updates a specific task by its ID using the PUT /tasks/{task_id} endpoint.
Deletes a specific task by its ID using the DELETE /tasks/{task_id} endpoint.
